Submodules¶

bakalib.extra.municipality module¶

municipality¶

class bakalib.extra.municipality.Municipality¶

Bases: object

This is a container for certain methods for fetching cities and schools using Bakaláři school system

Raises

RuntimeError – If the class gets instantiated

class City(name: str, school_count: int)¶

Bases: object

Bases: object

classmethod cities() → List[bakalib.extra.municipality.Municipality.City]¶

Fetches all cities in municipality database

Raises

BakalibError – If fails to retrieve cities

Returns

List of cities

List[Municipality.City]

logger = <Logger [MUNICIPALITY] (DEBUG)>¶
municipality_url = 'https://sluzby.bakalari.cz/api/v1/municipality/'¶
classmethod schools(city: str) → List[bakalib.extra.municipality.Municipality.School]¶

Fetches all schools in a specified city

Parameters

city (str) – Name of a city

Raises

  • BakalibError – If city not found

  • BakalibError – If failed to retrieve schools

Returns

List of schools

Return type

List[Municipality.School]
